metadata.title: AI-Q System Recovery Status Summary
metadata.purpose: Comprehensive status after critical system recovery

recovery_summary.original_failure: Complete environment configuration failure left AI-Q ecosystem non-functional
recovery_summary.root_cause: Missing .env and .env.example files containing 50+ required environment variables
critical_fixes_implemented: PowerShell usage banned across all documentation
Docker services restarted with proper environment

restarting_services.name: ai-q-weaviate
restarting_services.issue: Transformer API connection fix in progress

environment_restoration.description: Restored 105-line environment files with all required variables

powershell_ban.description: Banned PowerShell usage across all project documentation

terminal_standards.description: Implemented terminal usage standards with cmd/bash only

docker_recovery.description: Restarted Docker services with proper environment configuration

immediate: Fix remaining unhealthy services (Ollama, Elasticsearch, MinIO)
short_term: Implement missing Docker services (Open WebUI, Nextcloud, Registry)

lessons_learned.powershell_issues: PowerShell commands cause consistent failures and timeouts
lessons_learned.environment_criticality: Environment files are single point of failure for entire ecosystem
lessons_learned.backup_importance: Critical to maintain working backups of environment configuration
lessons_learned.terminal_standards: Need strict terminal usage standards to prevent future issues
